history.summary: Develop and plan features and improvements to our various SaaS applications. I also conduct code reviews, evaluations and mentor junior developers
highlights: Built a voicemail marketing platform using ReactJs, Laravel and Twilio
Designed and created a landing page editor (similar to LeadPages) using AngularJs and Laravel
Created a web based conferencing platform using Twilio's WebRTC Javascript SDK
Migrated our companies entire network to Digital Ocean

Implemented several hosting solutions for our unique company needs, this included a three server MySql cluster and a custom built HaProxy load balancing solution that handles SSL termination for over a thousand domains

history.summary: Build and maintain several web and mobile applications using a variety of technologies.
highlights: Designed and created an automated contact dialing platform using Twilio
Built our companies external REST API on ZF2
Created a media storage and service platform for our SaaS application similar to dropbox
